full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENG GE'I GDONG CAN GYI BZLOG BSGYUR DGRA BGEGS 'DUL BYED SHIN TU GSANG BA MAN NGAG BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(ZHES YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENGGE'I GDONG CAN GYI BZLOG BSGYUR DGRA BGEGS 'DUL BZLOG SHIN TU GSANG BA CES BYA BA 'DI NI, MCHOD DPON PA BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS KYIS BSKUL BA DANG, RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN PA BYUNG DAM, ,SNYAM PA'I BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS, ^ BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LA BRTEN NAS BGYIS PA, DE LA NOD PA'I TSOGS CI MA CHIS PA THAMS CAD BLA MA MKHA' 'GRO'I TSOGS LA 'CHAGS SO, ,)
